name: Ghost Adventure (Unity)
description:
hello everyone, I have updated the ghost adventure game from construct 2 to unity and still use the same free assets. Thank you to the creators, sorry I forgot to save the names of the creators, this is a lesson for me, next time I will not forget, thanks again to the creators.

To the creators, I apologize for my negligence, it is a lesson for me not to repeat myself, by the way thank you very much, you really helped me!

Last but not least, please feel free to criticize and suggest for better games!
